content.rendered: Meet John, former Telecom Engineer and now Quantitative Strategies Business Manager at Millennium. The firm “always had his back,” helping him grow into new roles and push his career path in new directions.

excerpt.rendered: Meet John, former Telecom Engineer and now Quantitative Strategies Business Manager at Millennium. The firm “always had his back,” helping him grow into new roles and push his career path in new directions.
